definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The type of surgery is the first to be conducted on an infant.
sentences.chinese: 这是首次在初生婴儿身上进行的同类型手术。

sentences.english: I bought a loaf of bread at the baker's.
sentences.chinese: 这面包干了，我得去同面包师说一说。

sentences.english: The “others” were asleep, while they both breathed the same fever.
sentences.chinese: “他人”都睡熟了，只有他们两个呼吸着同一种热度。

sentences.english: And look a little further down in the same paragraph.
The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍卖成交价成反比的原则确定。

sentences.english: A Wang is looking for you.
sentences.chinese: 一位姓王的同介词短语志正在找你。

sentences.english: This was probably the first time the Britons came into contact with other peoples.
sentences.chinese: 这或许是不列颠人第一次同外族人进行交往。

sentences.english: Eg. For years he refused to associate with Stephenson's staff.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，他一直拒绝同史蒂芬森手下的人交往。

sentences.english: An open war between Sweden and Russia broke out in 1554.
sentences.chinese: 1554年，瑞典同露西亚公开爆发战争。

sentences.english: Despite their many differences, there is a remarkable degree of homogeneity among them.
sentences.chinese: 他们的差异点虽多，但其间亦有极大的同质点。

sentences.english: Suprun's project was done in collaboration with Germany's Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 苏普伦的研究项目是同德国红十字会合作完成的。

sentences.english: The challenger showed the white feather as soon as he stepped into the ring with the champion.
sentences.chinese: 这位挑战者同冠军一踏进拳击场时就胆怯了。

sentences.english: The arrival of Princess Wen Cheng and promote Tibetan culture, the integration of clothing with the Central Plains.
sentences.chinese: 文成公主的到来，推动了藏族服饰同中原文化的融合。

sentences.english: It was my good fortune to be linked with Madame Curie through twenty years of sublime and unclouded friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我幸运地同居里夫人有20年崇高而真挚的友谊。

sentences.english: They say she plays guitar and cries and sings.
sentences.chinese: 大家都话她识弹结他，又识鬼咁叫同唱歌仔。

sentences.english: Better to live in a desert than with a quarrelsome and ill-tempered wife.
sentences.chinese: 宁可住在旷野，不与争吵使气的妇人同住。

definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
